<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BtnNumKey" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="205" height="70">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             source.up="mobile_ui_json.btn_num" source.disabled="mobile_ui_json.btn_num_grey" source.down="mobile_ui_json.btn_num2" source="mobile_ui_json.btn_num"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="26"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" alpha.disabled="0.4"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ConfirmWindowSkin" width="600" height="300" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="16122062de4" ></w:Config>
	<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.8" ellipseHeight="100" ellipseWidth="100"/>
	<e:Label id="content" text="Label" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-42" x="263" lineSpacing="20"/>
	<e:Button id="okBtn" label="Button" horizontalCenter="-150" verticalCenter="47" y="83">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="scene_public_res_json.SingleButton"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="cancelBtn" label="Button" horizontalCenter="150" verticalCenter="47">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="scene_public_res_json.SingleButton"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="InvitationWindowSkin" width="1334" height="361" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="1615183ed60" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image source="scene_public_res_json.alert_bg_scale" fillMode="repeat" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image source="public_res_json.alert_bg" left="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="public_res_json.alert_bg" verticalCenter="0" y="10" right="0" rotation="180"/>




	<e:Group top="0" bottom="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image id="title" source="scene_public_res_json.EnterInvitation" y="54.5" horizontalCenter="0.5" x="365" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:TextInput id="invitationInput" width="500" height="78" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="417.00000000000006" y="142" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Button id="confirmBtn" label="确定" verticalCenter="83" horizontalCenter="0" x="549" y="240" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="scene_public_res_json.SingleButton"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0x2f724b" size="28"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image scale9Grid="26,6,38,33" width="250" height="48" rotation="-90" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="public_res_json.green_line" verticalCenter="0" y="306" left="10"/>
		<e:Image scale9Grid="26,6,38,33" width="250" height="48" rotation="90" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="public_res_json.green_line" verticalCenter="0" y="56" right="10"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?> <e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" 
	states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" height.normal="53"> 
 
 
 
		<e:Group anchorOffsetX="0" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" left.disabled="0" right.disabled="0" top.disabled="0" bottom.disabled="0" height.normal="53">
			<e:Image source="public_res_json.input_noLight" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" scale9Grid="19,12,84,29" source.normal="scene_public_res_json.inputBg" left.normal="-11" right.normal="-12" top.normal="-12" bottom.normal="-14" anchorOffsetY.normal="0" scale9Grid.normal="40,24,49,29" anchorOffsetX.normal="0" left.disabled="0" right.disabled="0" top.disabled="0" bottom.disabled="0"/>
			<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" width="200" height="20" size="24" text="" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" textAlign="center" textColor="0xffffff" horizontalCenter.disabled="0" height.disabled="30" verticalCenter.disabled="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor.disabled="0xffffff" height.normalWithPrompt="30" height.disabledWithPrompt="30" verticalAlign.disabledWithPrompt="middle" verticalAlign.normalWithPrompt="middle" verticalAlign.disabled="middle" verticalAlign.normal="middle" height.normal="30"/>
			<e:Label id="promptDisplay" width="200" height="20" size="24" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" text="" anchorOffsetX="0" horizontalCenter="0" textAlign="center" textColor="0xffffff" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" x="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" verticalCenter="0" verticalAlign.normalWithPrompt="middle" verticalAlign.disabledWithPrompt="middle" height.disabledWithPrompt="30"/>
		</e:Group> 
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BattleDialog" width="1334" height="341" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="1615a4e87ae"/>
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="-1" bottom="1" fillMode="scale" source="public_res_json.dialog_mask"/>
	<e:Image source="public_res_json.green_line" scale9Grid="35,6,21,36" left="0" right="0" top="50"/>
	<e:Image source="public_res_json.green_line" scaleY="-1" scale9Grid="39,6,16,36" left="0" right="0" bottom="20"/>
	<e:Group width="200" height="66.66" anchorOffsetY="0" top="78" left="33">
		<e:Image source="battle_scene_json.dialog_name" x="-394" y="24.45" scaleX="-1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="nameLabel" text="源码终端" x="85" y="48.3" textColor="0x7dcdff"/>
		<e:Image source="battle_scene_json.dialog_name" x="-384" y="39.3" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle" gap="10"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label id="contentLabel" text="因为检查到了一次传送误差\n因为检查到了一次传送误差\n因为检查到了一次传送误差" anchorOffsetY="0" left="36" right="35" top="171" bottom="70" anchorOffsetX="0" lineSpacing="20" size="26"/>
	<e:Button id="skipBtn" label="跳过剧情" right="40" top="77" height="56" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" width="192" height="52">
	<e:Rect anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillAlpha="0" strokeAlpha="0" touchChildren="true" touchEnabled="true" width="192" x="0" height="52" y="0"/>
			<e:Image source="battle_scene_json.forward_btn" source.down="battle_scene_json.forward_btn" right="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="跳过剧情" size="24" right="50" height="26" textColor="0x94EAB8" verticalCenter="2"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="nextBtn" label="" right="34" bottom="50">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="public_res_json.next_btn" source.down="public_res_json.next_btn"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BattleUI" width="1334" height="750" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" touchChildren="true" touchEnabled="false">
		<e:Button id="tipBtn" label="" left="8" top="8">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="battle_scene_json.help_btn" source.down="battle_scene_json.help_btn"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="backBtn" label="" left="8" top="8" visible="false">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="battle_scene_json.back_btn" source.down="battle_scene_json.back_btn"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Group width="134" height="40" bottom="13" left="13">
			<e:Image source="mobile_ui_json.frame_pos" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Label text="x:" x="13" size="20" textColor="0xb3ffd3" verticalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Label id="lbPosX" text="0" x="34" size="20" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0xffffff"/>
			<e:Label text="y:" x="75" size="20" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0xB3FFD3"/>
			<e:Label id="lbPosY" text="0" x="95" size="20" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0xffffff"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="gpEditor" width="480" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" visible="false">
			<e:Group id="editorPanel" width="480" right="0" bottom="0" top="0" anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Image source="battle_scene_json.frame1" left="-1" right="1" top="1" bottom="-1" scale9Grid="20,20,8,8" touchEnabled="true"/>
				<e:Button id="helpBtn" label="" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="-64" top="8">
					<e:skinName>
					<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
						<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="battle_scene_json.btn_tip" source.down="battle_scene_json.btn_tip"/>
						<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					</e:Skin>
					</e:skinName>
				</e:Button>
			<e:Group id="editorArea" anchorOffsetY="0" left="20" right="21" top="20" bottom="108" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
			<e:Button id="stopBtn" label="" bottom="34" right="256.81">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="battle_scene_json.stop_btn_normal" source.down="battle_scene_json.stop_btn_hover"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Button id="runBtn" label="" bottom="34" right="30">
				<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="battle_scene_json.run_btn_normal" source.down="battle_scene_json.run_btn_down"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
				</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="missionPanel" width="172" height="200" top="86" left="8" anchorOffsetX="0">
			<e:Image source="battle_scene_json.mission_line" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" scale9Grid="0,3,200,6"/>
			<e:Label text="任务" x="8" y="5" textColor="0xeacb2c" size="20"/>
			<e:Group id="missions" anchorOffsetY="0" left="0" right="0" top="32" bottom="0">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout gap="0"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="helpPanel" left="-4" right="484" top="1" bottom="0" anchorOffsetX="0" visible="false">
			<e:Image anchorOffsetX="0" left="0" right="-15" top="1" bottom="0" source="battle_scene_json.frame3" scale9Grid="20,86,20,12" touchEnabled="true"/>
			<e:Button id="closeBtn" label="" right="-8" top="7">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="battle_scene_json.closeBtn" source.down="battle_scene_json.closeBtn"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
			</e:Button>
			<e:Group id="tabs" height="70" left="32" top="32" right="74" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0">
				<e:ToggleButton id="tab1" label="角色基础函数命令" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" height="70" anchorOffsetX="0" width="200" name="tab1">
					<e:skinName>
						<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
						<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="public_res_json.bg2" source.down="public_res_json.bg4"/>
						<e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8" size="22" textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor.up="0xb2aeae"/>
						</e:Skin>
					</e:skinName>
				</e:ToggleButton>
				<e:ToggleButton id="tab0" label="关键字" x="10" y="10" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" height="70" anchorOffsetX="0" width="200" name="tab2">
					<e:skinName>
						<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
						<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="public_res_json.bg2" source.down="public_res_json.bg4"/>
						<e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8" size="22" textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor.up="0xb2aeae"/>
						</e:Skin>
					</e:skinName>
				</e:ToggleButton>
				<e:layout>
					<e:HorizontalLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group top="102" left="32" bottom="32" right="56" anchorOffsetX="0">
				<e:Image source="public_res_json.bg3" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
				<e:Scroller id="helpScroller" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
					<e:List id="helpList" x="1.52">
						<e:layout>
							<e:VerticalLayout gap="2" horizontalAlign="contentJustify"/>
						</e:layout>
					</e:List>
				</e:Scroller>
				<e:Group id="helpScrollArea" width="22.33" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" right="-39" top="0" bottom="0">
					<e:Rect scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" strokeAlpha="0" fillColor="0x486949"/>
					<e:Button id="helpScrollBar" label="" y="249" left="0" right="0" height="100">
						<e:skinName>
							<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
	<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" strokeAlpha="0" fillColor="0x648565"/>
							<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
							</e:Skin>
						</e:skinName>
					</e:Button>
				</e:Group>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="CharacterNameSkin" width="120" height="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="15f9edc0e82" ></w:Config>
	<e:Group anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
